attributes.action: Allow ALL Gurkhas with 3 or more years service (and their immediate family) FULL rights to residency in the UK
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The Gurkhas have served this country and it's interests with loyalty and bravery second to none since 1814. Many thousands have died fighting to preserve our way of life, this country and it's government owes these faithful allies a debt of gratitude which could at least be partially repaid by granting FULL UK residency rights to ALL Gurkhas and their families upon completion of 3 years service in the UK Armed Forces (no matter where they are stationed)

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
